name: Ghosts Of Aliens
description:
Ghosts of Aliens is a short(Probably 5 hours) role playing rpg game that follows the adventures of Atum and an old man named Gwaldin, and later 3 other heroes. On October 1st, 1963, an alien ship crashes on the planet of Appalathia, in a desert near the town of Roswell. For 5 years, the alien inside this ship lives off of rations and eventually dies becoming the ghost of an alien. Gwaldin, the old man, tells of a prophecy that a hero would crash from the sky down to the world of Appalathia and defeat the 5 Doom Beasts that are scattered across the world.

Journey through extremely stylish enviroments that make the world of Appalathia become alive, from dark forests to light forests to neon forests, to ice cold lands to tropical paradises, to small villages, big cities, western places, everywhere all over Appalathia.
